org.gradle.language.base

Interface BuildableModelElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Buildable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AssemblerSourceSet, Binary, ClassDirectoryBinary, CppSourceSet, CSourceSet, DependentSourceSet, ExecutableBinary, HeaderExportingSourceSet, JavaSourceSet, LanguageSourceSet, LibraryBinary, NativeBinary, ObjectiveCppSourceSet, ObjectiveCSourceSet, ProjectNativeBinary, ResourceSet, SharedLibraryBinary, StaticLibraryBinary, TestSuiteExecutableBinary, VisualStudioProject, VisualStudioSolution, WindowsResourceSet

    @Incubating
public interface BuildableModelElement
extends Buildable
    A model element that is directly buildable. Such an element mirrors a specified lifecycle task in the DAG, and can accept dependencies which are then associated with the lifecycle task.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void builtBy(Object... tasks)
      Adds a task that is required for the construction of this element.
      boolean hasBuildDependencies() 
      void setLifecycleTask(Task lifecycleTask)
      Associates a 'lifecycle' task with the construction of this element.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradle.api.Buildable

        getBuildDependencies

    • Method Detail

      • setLifecycleTask

        void setLifecycleTask(Task lifecycleTask)
        Associates a 'lifecycle' task with the construction of this element.

      • builtBy

        void builtBy(Object... tasks)
        Adds a task that is required for the construction of this element. A task added this way is then added as a dependency of the associated lifecycle task.

      • hasBuildDependencies

        boolean hasBuildDependencies()
